item.title: 国际货币基金组织称塞内加尔已解开隐藏的债务丑闻
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示，塞内加尔已经解决了现政府在去年大选中获胜时遗留下来的隐性债务问题，这表明不会再出现意外，并为与贷款方达成新协议铺平了道路。【原文：Senegal has unpicked the hidden-debt problem the current government inherited when it won elections last year, the International Monetary Fund said, suggesting no more surprises are in store and paving the way for a new deal with the lender.】

item.title: 在与竞争对手的间谍丑闻中，Deel 的估值达到 173 亿美元
item.description: 与竞争对手 Rippling 陷入激烈官司的人力资源软件初创公司 Deel Inc.【原文：Deel Inc., a human resources software startup embroiled in a bitter legal battle with rival Rippling, has raised $300 million in a new round of funding that boosts the company’s valuation to $17.3 billion.】

item.title: Wunsch 称欧洲央行在利率问题上做得近乎完美
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员皮埃尔-温施（Pierre Wunsch）认为，欧洲中央银行在应对千载难逢的通胀冲击方面几乎做对了一切。【原文：The European Central Bank has done almost everything right in responding to a once-in-a-lifetime inflation shock, according to Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch.】

item.title: 维克多-什韦茨谈非理性世界中预测的无用性
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 利率下降，美国住宅建筑商信心创 2024 年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 受抵押贷款利率下降的推动，本月美国住宅建筑商的信心上升幅度为 2024 年初以来最大。【原文：Confidence among US homebuilders rose this month by the most since early 2024, boosted by lower mortgage rates that are chipping away at the nation’s affordability problem.】

item.title: 卢特尼克斯的坎特希望通过 Tether 基金获得 250 亿美元财富
item.description: 在向投资者推介 Tether Holdings 的过程中，Cantor Fitzgerald LP 面临着任何一家投资银行都会感受到的压力，因为它要以有史以来最高的估值之一完成一笔巨大的私人交易。还有 250 亿美元。【原文：As it pitches Tether Holdings to investors, Cantor Fitzgerald LP faces the pressure any investment bank would feel trying to pull off a huge private deal at one of the highest valuations ever. And then there’s $25 billion.】

item.title: 强劲财报抢走贸易战风头，美国股市上涨
item.description: 由于强劲的企业盈利报告增强了人们对经济的信心，并使人们不再关注中美之间正在进行的贸易战，周四股市高开高走。【原文：Stocks opened higher on Thursday, as strong corporate earnings reports bolstered confidence in the economy and shifted the focus from an ongoing trade war between the US and China.】

item.title: 英国央行行长曼警告 "明显的上行证据 "表明通胀僵持不下
item.description: 英国央行利率制定者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）警告说，有 "非常明显的上行证据 "表明，英国通胀率将在更长时间内保持在央行 2% 的目标之上。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Catherine Mann warned there is “very clear upside evidence” of UK inflation lingering above the central bank’s 2% target for longer.】

item.title: 优步推出 "数据任务"，部分美国司机可从中赚钱
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is giving some drivers in the US the option to earn money by completing tasks related to the company’s nascent data labelling business, an area where the rideshare giant sees an opportunity to shine in the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 欧洲 IPO 浪潮将折扣数学置于买家清单之首
item.description: 今年秋季欧洲首次公开募股的规模约为 70 亿美元，这表明卖方必须在预付现金的风险与为股票交易留出足够空间之间取得平衡。【原文：The roughly $7 billion batch of European initial public offerings this fall has shown sellers must balance the risk of upfront cash versus leaving enough room for the stocks to trade higher.】

item.title: 中国贸易争端升级，汽车制造商力保芯片安全
item.description: 中国对一家不知名的荷兰供应商实施报复性出口管制，有可能引发连锁反应，导致生产线停产，汽车制造商正准备应对新的潜在芯片干扰。【原文：Automakers are bracing for fresh potential chip disruption, with China’s retaliatory export controls on an obscure Dutch supplier threatening to set off a chain reaction that could halt production lines.】

item.title: 迈阿密 Citadel 办事处、微软公司加入 25,000 美元会员俱乐部
item.description: 迈阿密最高档的办公楼— Citadel 和 Thoma Bravo 等租户都在这里插上了旗帜— 顶层两层是一个会员俱乐部和米其林星级集团的餐厅。【原文：Miami’s most exclusive office tower — where tenants like Citadel and Thoma Bravo have planted their flags — is topping off the top two floors with a members club and restaurant from a Michelin-starred group.】

item.title: Webull 向美国客户提供个人公司债券交易服务
item.description: 在线零售经纪商 Webull Corp. 开始为美国客户提供公司债券交易。【原文：Online retail brokerage Webull Corp. is starting to offer corporate-bond trading for US customers.】

item.title: 无人驾驶汽车 Waymos 将在凤凰城配送 DoorDash 订单
item.description: 凤凰城地区的 DoorDash 公司客户可能会让 Waymo 自动驾驶汽车送达他们的订单，这是新合作关系的一部分。【原文：DoorDash Inc. customers in the Phoenix area may have their orders delivered by a Waymo autonomous vehicle as part of a new partnership that will help keep the robotaxis busy when there’s a lull in demand from passengers.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴尔呼吁加强监管以提高稳定币信任度
item.description: 美联储理事迈克尔-巴尔说，需要更具体的监管来保护稳定币，他说稳定币有能力为金融系统带来各种好处。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michael Barr said more specific regulation is needed to safeguard stablecoins, which he said have the capacity to provide a variety of benefits to the financial system.】

item.title: 微软希望我们通过新的人工智能功能与 Windows 11 对话
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）正试图让人们与电脑对话，并打赌语音和人工智能软件的强大功能足以让这种互动与键盘或鼠标一样有效。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is trying to get people to talk to their computers, betting that voice and artificial intelligence software is powerful enough to make such interactions as effective as a keyboard or mouse.】

item.title: 纽约联储地区服务业活动创 2021 年以来最大降幅
item.description: 纽约地区的服务业活动以四年多来最快的速度萎缩，反映出商业活动和员工人数的急剧下降。【原文：Services activity in the New York area contracted at the fastest pace in more than four years, reflecting a sharper decline in business activity and headcount.】

item.title: 瓦尔德支持的西班牙银行计划将 SRT 与信用卡贷款挂钩
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Varde Partners LP 旗下的西班牙在线贷款公司 WiZink Bank SA 正在进行与信用卡贷款相关的重大风险转移。【原文：WiZink Bank SA, a Spanish online lender owned by Varde Partners LP, is working on a significant risk transfer tied to credit card loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度监管机构将升级 HFT 规则以确保公平竞争
item.description: 印度证券监管机构负责人周四表示，该机构将升级算法和高频交易框架，以确保为所有市场参与者提供公平的竞争环境。【原文：India’s securities regulator will upgrade its algorithmic and high-frequency trading framework to ensure a level playing field for all market participants, its chief said on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长多伦茨认为明年通胀将出现超调
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员普里莫兹-多伦茨（Primoz Dolenc）表示，欧元区通胀率放缓的程度可能会比人们担心的要低，2026 年欧洲央行的通胀率可能会低于 2% 的目标，从而支持稳健的利率政策。【原文：Euro-area inflation is likely to slow less significantly below the European Central Bank’s 2% target in 2026 than feared, supporting the case for a steady hand on interest rates, Governing Council member Primoz Dolenc said.】

item.title: 二十国集团权衡债务减免计划被指过于臃肿的解决方案
item.description: 20 国集团的协调债务减免倡议自 2020 年启动以来，因其过于缓慢和臃肿而受到指责。【原文：Support is growing for enhancements to the Group of 20’s coordinated debt-relief initiative, faulted for being too slow and unwieldy since its inception in 2020.】

item.title: 万宝盛华集团恢复增长，显示就业市场稳定
item.description: 万宝盛华集团（ManpowerGroup Inc.【原文：ManpowerGroup Inc. posted its first quarterly revenue gain since early 2022, an indication the global labor market is more resilient than thought.】

item.title: 印度称不了解特朗普与莫迪就俄罗斯石油问题的对话
item.description: 在美国领导人表示他与印度总理进行了交谈并承诺停止购买俄罗斯石油数小时后，印度外交部表示不知道美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪周三进行了会谈。【原文：India’s foreign ministry said it’s unaware of a conversion between President Donald Trump and Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday, hours after the US leader said he spoke with his Indian counterpart, who pledged to halt Russian oil purchases.】

item.title: 百达翡丽加入价值 13 万亿美元的 ETF 基金竞赛，测试 "大趋势
item.description: 当皮克泰集团于 2020 年 10 月在美国开设第一家办事处时，第五大道上冷冷清清。疫情肆虐的纽约已经关门歇业，公司的到来在中城空旷的街道上几乎无人问津。【原文：When Pictet Group opened its first US office in October 2020, Fifth Avenue was deserted. With a pandemic-struck New York shuttered, the firm’s arrival went largely unnoticed on an empty stretch of Midtown.】

item.title: 停摆如何切断了指导美联储决策的关键数据
item.description: 在美国经济的关键时刻，政府停摆让政策制定者无所适从。美联储官员准备在 10 月底决定是继续降息还是保持利率稳定，但他们必须在有限的新鲜数据面前做出决定。【原文：The government shutdown has left policymakers flying blind at a crucial moment for the US economy. Federal Reserve officials are preparing to decide in late October whether to keep lowering interest rates or hold them steady — but they’ll have to do so with limited fresh data.】

item.title: 数十亿美元交易背后鲜为人知的加密货币巨头
item.description: 在短短两年时间里，这个由一小群工程师建立起来的鲜为人知的去中心化交易所吸引了重量级投资者和数十亿美元的交易量。【原文：In just two years, a little-known decentralized exchange built by a small group of engineers has drawn heavyweight investors and billions in trading volume.】

item.title: 谷歌利用微软停机事件推出切换工具
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司（Google）正在升级与微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）的企业客户争夺战，增加了两款新产品，目的是在微软 365 生产力软件停止服务的情况下保持企业在线。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google is escalating its battle with Microsoft Corp. for corporate customers, adding two new products designed to keep businesses online if Microsoft 365 productivity software goes out of service.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒呼吁谨慎缩表，米兰主张采取更大举措
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，官员们可以继续以四分之一个百分点的幅度降低利率，以支持摇摇欲坠的劳动力市场，而斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）则继续主张更大幅度地降低利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said officials can keep lowering interest rates in quarter-percentage-point increments to support a faltering labor market, while Stephen Miran continued to advocate a larger reduction.】

item.title: 贝伦贝格下调路威酩轩集团评级，称奢侈品超级周期已结束
item.description: 贝伦贝格（Berenberg）分析师认为，奢侈品行业三十年的繁荣期已经结束，该分析师下调了路威酩轩集团（LVMH）的评级，与此同时，该公司股价出现了自 2001 年以来的最大涨幅。【原文：The luxury sector’s three-decade boom is over, according to Berenberg analysts whose downgrade of LVMH coincided with the stock’s biggest surge since 2001.】

item.title: 巴芬称德国大宗商品交易商 BayWa 的账目存在漏洞
item.description: 德国金融监管机构 Bafin 称，BayWa AG 的 2023 年账目存在缺陷。该公司股价下跌。【原文：BayWa AG’s 2023 accounts were deficient, Germany’s financial watchdog Bafin said. The firm’s share price dropped.】
